ocrd-tesserocr-deskew.description: Detect script, orientation and skew angle for pages or regions

dpi.description: pixel density in dots per inch (overrides any meta-data in the images); disabled when negative

operation_level.description: PAGE XML hierarchy level to operate on

min_orientation_confidence.description: Minimum confidence score to apply orientation as detected by OSD

ocrd-tesserocr-fontshape.description: Recognize font shapes (family/monospace/bold/italic) and size in segmented words with Tesseract (using annotated derived images, or masking and cropping images from coordinate polygons), annotating TextStyle

dpi.description: pixel density in dots per inch (overrides any meta-data in the images); disabled when negative

padding.description: Number of background-filled pixels to add around the word image (i.e. the annotated AlternativeImage if it exists or the higher-level image cropped to the bounding box and masked by the polygon otherwise) on each side before recognition.

model.description: tessdata model to apply (an ISO 639-3 language specification or some other basename, e.g. deu-frak or osd); must be an old (pre-LSTM) model

ocrd-tesserocr-recognize.description: Recognize text in lines with Tesseract (using annotated derived images, or masking and cropping images from coordinate polygons)

dpi.description: pixel density in dots per inch (overrides any meta-data in the images); disabled when negative

padding.description: Extend detected region/line/word rectangles by this many (true) pixels, or extend existing region/line/word images (i.e. the annotated AlternativeImage if it exists or the higher-level image cropped to the bounding box and masked by the polygon otherwise) by this many (background/white) pixels on each side before recognition.

overwrite_regions.description: Remove existing layout and text annotation below the page level, and detect new regions.

overwrite_lines.description: Remove existing layout and text annotation below the region level, and detect new lines (unless textequiv_level is region).

overwrite_words.description: Remove existing layout and text annotation below the text line level, and detect new words (unless textequiv_level is region or line).

textequiv_level.description: Lowest PAGE XML hierarchy level to re-use or detect segments for and add the TextEquiv results to (before projecting upwards); when ``none``, adds segmentation up to the glyph level but does not attempt recognition at all.

block_polygons.description: When detecting regions, annotate polygon coordinates instead of bounding box rectangles.

find_tables.description: When detecting regions, recognise tables as table regions (``textord_tabfind_find_tables=1``).

sparse_text.description: When detecting regions, use 'sparse text' page segmentation mode (finding as much text as possible in no particular order): only text regions, single lines without vertical or horizontal space.

raw_lines.description: When detecting lines, do not attempt additional segmentation (baseline+xheight+ascenders/descenders prediction) on line images. Can increase accuracy for certain workflows. Disable when line segments/images may contain components of more than 1 line, or larger gaps/white-spaces.

char_whitelist.description: When recognizing text, enumeration of character hypotheses (from the model) to allow exclusively; overruled by blacklist if set.

char_blacklist.description: When recognizing text, enumeration of character hypotheses (from the model) to suppress; overruled by unblacklist if set.

char_unblacklist.description: When recognizing text, enumeration of character hypotheses (from the model) to allow inclusively.

model.description: The tessdata text recognition model to apply (an ISO 639-3 language specification or some other basename, e.g. deu-frak or Fraktur).

ocrd-tesserocr-segment.description: Segment page into regions and lines with Tesseract

dpi.description: pixel density in dots per inch (overrides any meta-data in the images); disabled when negative

padding.description: extend detected region rectangles by this many (true) pixels

block_polygons.description: annotate polygon coordinates instead of bounding box rectangles

sparse_text.description: use 'sparse text' page segmentation mode (find as much text as possible in no particular order): only text regions, single lines without vertical or horizontal space

ocrd-tesserocr-segment-region.description: Segment page into regions with Tesseract

dpi.description: pixel density in dots per inch (overrides any meta-data in the images); disabled when negative

overwrite_regions.description: remove existing layout and text annotation below the Page level

padding.description: extend detected region rectangles by this many (true) pixels

crop_polygons.description: annotate polygon coordinates instead of bounding box rectangles

sparse_text.description: use 'sparse text' page segmentation mode (find as much text as possible in no particular order): only text regions, single lines without vertical or horizontal space

ocrd-tesserocr-segment-table.description: Segment table regions into cell text regions with Tesseract

dpi.description: pixel density in dots per inch (overrides any meta-data in the images); disabled when negative

overwrite_regions.description: remove existing layout and text annotation below the region level

ocrd-tesserocr-segment-line.description: Segment regions into lines with Tesseract

dpi.description: pixel density in dots per inch (overrides any meta-data in the images); disabled when negative

overwrite_lines.description: remove existing layout and text annotation below the TextRegion level

ocrd-tesserocr-segment-word.description: Segment lines into words with Tesseract

dpi.description: pixel density in dots per inch (overrides any meta-data in the images); disabled when negative

overwrite_words.description: remove existing layout and text annotation below the TextLine level

ocrd-tesserocr-crop.description: Poor man's cropping via region segmentation

dpi.description: pixel density in dots per inch (overrides any meta-data in the images); disabled when negative

padding.description: extend detected border by this many (true) pixels on every side

ocrd-tesserocr-binarize.description: Binarize regions or lines with Tesseract's global Otsu

operation_level.description: PAGE XML hierarchy level to operate on
